title: Pseudo-Prompt Generating in Pre-trained Vision-Language Models for Multi-Label Medical Image Classification
content: Pseudo-Prompt Generating (PsPG) is designed to address Multi-Label Medical Image Classification task, capitalizing on the priori knowledge of multi-modal features. Featuring a RNN-based decoder, PsPG autoregressively generates class-tailored embedding vectors, i.e., pseudo-prompts.

title: Qt-DIS - Simple GUI Segmentation Program
content: The segmentation method is derived from Highly Accurate Dichotomous Image Segmentation (ECCV'22). I converted pre-trained models to ONNX and built this GUI program using Qt.

title: Wechat Mini Program - School Timetable
content: A front-end and back-end separation project. I independently complete the front-end development work. Powered by WXML/Less, TypeScript.

title: Bad Apple!! - 30-Frames Video Streaming
content: Wi-Fi transmission based 30-frames video streaming for MCUs. A server is started on the host to transfer the video frame data via bitstream to a Wi-Fi client on a ESP8266 to play 30-frames videos on the OLED screen. Audio is played synchronously by non-blocking delay.
